trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Austintown
There were no other sightings in Austintown on or around July 16th 2013
Summary: swaw at least 10 light in sky over austintown ohio
divs: Sighting Detailswe where on mahoning ave in austintown ohio and the corner of 46 we look to the left in the sky and saw at least 8 objects in the sky to the left then seeen four more come out from behind the tree line some where flying really close others further apart the was alot of other traffic on the road as well i had my window down pointing at the sky they where sloid red light and the lights made the craft look like they where round they where up pretty high and a few where moving faster than the others. the first thing i thought when i seen theses things was that there are way to many and they are way to close to each other to be planes some where moving and othere where standing still. i litterly asked my wife five time wtf is that others in the area seen it too because they had the same reaction as i didi did call local tv station and ask if they had any other calls they said no we lost sight of the object when we turned right on 46 toward canfield i wanted to try to get photo or vidoe with smart phone but it was to dark out side to get it to picv up the objects on my screen the objects did have a weird pattern they where in in the sky my daugther had also seen theses but she is to young to tell you what she seen
